channel.title: Automation on Ryan Duffy - AI Infrastructure & Local LLM Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Ryan Duffy - AI Infrastructure & Local LLM Journey

item.title: ChromaDB Weekend: From 504 to 24,916 Documents
item.description: A weekend implementing ChromaDB, a Monday demoing it at work, and discovering that 1,142 files need more than folders - they need semantic search.

item.title: Teaching the System to Blog About Itself: The Ultimate Meta-Project
item.description: The final episode: Working with Claude to analyze 1,133 documents, review 200+ conversations, and collaboratively write the story of the system’s creation. When AI and human document infrastructure together.

item.title: Teaching the System to Document Itself: Automated Architecture Diagrams
item.description: From hand-coded Mermaid diagrams to automated architecture visualization. An evening working with Claude to teach the system to document itself.
